changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE DonationType ADD id_text varchar(36) GENERATED ALWAYS AS (LCASE(CONCAT_WS('-', HEX(SUBSTR(id, 1, 4)), HEX(SUBSTR(id, 5, 2)), HEX(SUBSTR(id, 7, 2)), HEX(SUBSTR(id, 9, 2)), HEX(SUBSTR(id, 11)) ))) VIRTUAL AFTER id;

ALTER TABLE DonationType_AUD ADD id_text varchar(36) GENERATED ALWAYS AS (LCASE(CONCAT_WS('-', HEX(SUBSTR(id, 1, 4)), HEX(SUBSTR(id, 5, 2)), HEX(SUBSTR(id, 7, 2)), HEX(SUBSTR(id, 9, 2)), HEX(SUBSTR(id, 11)) ))) VIRTUAL AFTER id;
UPDATE DonationType_AUD AS updateTable LEFT JOIN DonationType AS joinTable ON (updateTable.id_temp = joinTable.id_temp) SET updateTable.id = joinTable.id WHERE joinTable.id IS NOT null;
DELETE DonationType_AUD FROM DonationType_AUD LEFT JOIN DonationType AS joinTable ON (DonationType_AUD.id = joinTable.id) WHERE joinTable.id IS null

UPDATE Donation AS updateTable LEFT JOIN DonationType AS joinedTable ON (updateTable.donationType_id_temp = joinedTable.id_temp) SET updateTable.donationType_id = joinedTable.id WHERE joinedTable.id IS NOT null;

UPDATE Donation_AUD AS updateTable LEFT JOIN DonationType AS joinedTable ON (updateTable.donationType_id_temp = joinedTable.id_temp) SET updateTable.donationType_id = joinedTable.id WHERE joinedTable.id IS NOT null;
